---
title: Generate account statement
---

# Generate account statement

Generate an account statement for a custom time period.

:::info Dashboard
You can also generate statements from your Dashboard.

1. Go to **Dashboard** > **Data** > **Accounts**.
1. Open the account for which you want to generate a statement.
1. Go to the **Account statements** tab.
1. Click **+ New** and enter required information.
1. Click **Save**.
:::

## Guide {#guide}

1. Call the `generateAccountStatement` mutation.
1. Add the account ID.
1. Add the `openingDate` and `closingDate` with the following format: `YYYY-MM-DDT00:00:00.000Z` (up to three months).
1. Add all information you'd like to review about the statement (lines 9-19).

## Mutation {#mutation}

ðŸ”Ž [Open the mutation in API Explorer](https://explorer.swan.io?%3D&tab=api)

```graphql {4-6} showLineNumbers
mutation GenerateAccountStatement {
  generateAccountStatement(
    input: {
      accountId: "$YOUR_ACCOUNT_ID"
      openingDate: "2023-11-01T00:00:00.000Z"
      closingDate: "2024-11-01T00:00:00.000Z"
    }
  ) {
    closingDate
    createdAt
    fees {
      currency
      value
    }
    id
    openingDate
    period
    status
    updatedAt
  }
}
```

## Payload {#payload}

The mutation returns all of the requested information.
Notice the `period` = `Custom` (line 12), indicating that you generated this account statement, not Swan.

```json {12} showLineNumbers
{
  "data": {
    "generateAccountStatement": {
      "closingDate": "2024-01-01T00:00:00.000Z",
      "createdAt": "2024-01-19T10:08:17.082Z",
      "fees": {
        "currency": "EUR",
        "value": "0"
      },
      "id": "$ACCOUNT_STATEMENT_ID",
      "openingDate": "2023-11-01T00:00:00.000Z",
      "period": "Custom",
      "status": "Pending",
      "updatedAt": "2024-01-19T10:08:17.084Z"
    }
  }
}
```
